entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig not working or respected by Visual Studio! #60377
  • Avoid checking array/stackalloc creation sync in NullableWalker #60376
  • csharpcodedefinitionwindow.codedefinitionwindowopensmetadataassource failing #60364
  • csharpcodedefinitionwindow.codedefinitionwindowopensmetadataassource failing #60363
  • Improve pointer dereference message clarity #60362
    Backlog
  • `[SuppressMessage]` should be able to suppress `dotnet_style_namespace_match_folder` warnings #60361
  • Non-public classes are visible while non-public methods aren't? #60360
  • Unable to evaluate local functions #60358

Closed

  • Speculating with `nameof` doesn't produce a `NameOfBinder` leading to incorrect results #60337
    17.2
  • C# interpolated raw strings cause FormatExceptions in .NET 5 and earlier #60374
    17.2
  • Unnecessary cast diagnostic sometimes missing in top level programs #60248
  • [New rule] Notify that foreach may throw InvalidCastException #54712
  • Intellisense not auto complete when writing code continously without enter #57646
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add formatter and smart indentation tests for checked operators #60375
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60373
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update breaking change document and compiler test plan for UTF8 String Literals #60372
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer to use patterns when they won't work #60370
    Area-IDE
  • Increase delay for getting compilation-available notifications from OOP #60369
    Area-IDE
  • Delay async taggers and navbars for files that are not visible #60367
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a race condition in IDE diagnostic service for stale diagnostics #60365
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • [LSP] Remove the majority of usages of client name. #60357
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60356
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Follow up on Test Plan Review and PROTOTYPE comments for UTF8 String Literals feature. #60349
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #58873
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #60366
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #60368
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Add EE tests for UTF8 String Literals. #60352
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Adjust DefiniteAssignmentPass.WriteConsideredUse for UTF8 String Literals. #60326
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Avoid resizing array builder while get unaliased references #60220
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Suppress nullable property/field initialization warning for required members #60243
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Do not run CI for non code files #60327
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string #60227
    Area-IDE
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respect C# naming conventions when generating parameter for record #60338
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial support for variable declarations under disjunctive patterns #59702
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix SymbolDisplay.FormatPrimitive #60346
    Area-Compilers
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove .git-blame-ignore-revs to avoid inaccurate blame on github #60350
    Area-Infrastructure
